overview: The protagonist is in a computer game store, and complains to the seller how he got everything. That everywhere one negative. The seller makes him a gift, in the form of glasses and says that they will change his life. The hero thinks that this is some kind of nonsense, but when he puts them on, he realizes that reality is changing. How does the hero use this opportunity? It remains to be seen whether he will choose the aberration of happiness.
title: Trueglasses
